abstract: Residents of Newport, RI are protesting construction of huge multi-sided mansion, complaining unusual structure being built just outside historic district does not fit neighborhood's elegant character; architect Andrew DiGiammo says house complies with zoning regulations and will blend in when finished.
lead_paragraph: Residents of the Rhode Island community — home to some of the nation’s grandest estates — are balking at the construction of a home with a futuristic design.
snippet: Residents of the Rhode Island community — home to some of the nation’s grandest estates — are balking at the construction of a home with a futuristic design....

headline.main: Newport, a City That Loves Its Mansions, Shudders at Its Newest One
headline.print_headline: City That Loves Its Mansions Shudders at Its Newest One
